name: Cassie Ventura's encounter with a man hinting at a sexually explicit video

attributes.description: In 2014, someone Ventura was working with at an event in Atlantic City hinted he had knowledge of a sexually explicit video of Ventura. Ventura assumed it was a video of the 'freak-offs' with escorts, and she anxiously texted Combs, who responded, 'This is crazy. Do not let him out of your sight.'
